summary: BLINKERS MALFUNCTION ON 2002 GRAND AM.  I HAD TO REPLACE THE MULTI-FUNCTION SWITCH TO FIX THE PROBLEM.  GM SAID THAT THERE IS NO RECALL FOR THIS ITEM.  A CLICKING NOISE FROM THE DASH INDICATED THAT THE SWITCH WAS BAD.  YOU HAD TO WIGGLE THE BLINKER LEVER TO GET THE CLICKING NOISE TO STOP.  THE PROBLEM GOT WORSE AS TIME PROGRESSED. *JB
